item.title: Anti Lisa
item.description: When: 2013 Contribution: Solo developer (full stack), application design, architect, concept. About: Motivated by the Europe 2020 energy targets, Game On was part of a project to educate people to save energy. I was responsible for the creation of a mobile app, designed with gamification principles in mind. I designed the application architecture and functionalities, developed the app for the iOS platform and I also made a prototype server based on PHP.

item.title: Anti Lisa
item.description: Beautiful isn’t it?
